[`IOFireWireSerialBusProtocolTransport`](/documentation/kernel/iofirewireserialbusprotocoltransport)SCSI Protocol Driver Family for FireWire SBP2 Devices.[`IOFireWireSBP2Target`](/documentation/kernel/iofirewiresbp2target)Serves as bridge between IOFireWireUnit and IOFireWireLUN.[`IOFireWireBus`](/documentation/kernel/iofirewirebus)IOFireWireBus is a public class the provides access to general FireWire functionality...
